1.title: Welcome to your new Family!

11.content:
The sun was rising early today, as the young Blake made his way up the walkway to the large manner where his new family lived. He'd been a orphan for most of his life, and so being adopted to a family was a sudden and strange thing for him. Weirder, they seemed to have a lot of money and lived in a rather large house. So massive it easily must have been over 40,000 square feet! He'd never even seen a home this large before. Blinded for a moment by the windows reflecting the sunlight as he made his way to the front door, the young man looked in awe at the door and soon, reached out to knock it... But before he even could a women answered the door.

"Hello there! You must be Blake... Mom has told me a lot about you." Said the girl, her long dark hair stunning as she smiled at the boy. Her face seemed almost... Evil. Twisted a little, yet it was hidden behind a stunning, and lustful appearance. As if her body was calling to be held by the boy. Not to mention the slutty way she was dressing, in nothing but a tank top and short shorts...

"Come on in cutie... Breakfast will be ready soon." She grinned, and by force took the boys hand, leading him in.

"MOM! Blake is here!" She shouted, and then another women, dressed just as showy walked over from the other room. "Oh! How fun! I can't wait to have breakfast with him. You'll love it Blake. Lora made it special." She winked, as a younger, but busty girl ran out too.

"Yeah! Hi there Blake! I'm your new little sister!" Was all she said, maybe anyway? It was hard to focus on her words as her chest was bouncing with every eager step she took.

It wasn't long before the new, and only boy in the family was told the names of his sisters and mom. With interdictions out of the way, the family went to get some tasty food. Pancakes and fruit. Not to mention Some OJ. They all dug in, Blake seems more than happy to have himself something to eat with his new mom and sisters. But about half way through the meal, Blake began to feel... Funny....

"What's wrong son? Hehe... I'm still not used to saying that..." Trisha smiled and looked at her boy as his world grew dizzy.

"I think it's working mom..." Lora grinned, and leaned in...

Before long, the young mans world went dark. The poor boy out cold after drinking some poisoned Orange juice. He wouldn't know that yet however... And it's going to be more of a shock when he wakes up... After his small nap, Blake would wake up to find something very wrong... Not only was he no longer in the dinning room with his family, he was also only 6 inches tall!

"W-What is this! W-What's going on!" He shouted in fear.

"Awe, Morning there." Said a sexy voice.

Blake turned around fast, to find that the one who was looming over him was none other than.....

12.content:
With a smile on her face and her small backpack of her belongings over her shoulder, Sarah made her way over to her new families home. A large manner, larger than the orphanage by a long shot. And looking rather nice for a girl who never knew of anything like family. It was almost over whelming, or imposing as she made her way up to the front door past the long walkway she had to traverse. Sarah reached out to knock on the solid wood door, only to have it pulled from her as it swung open, and a stunning dark haired girl met her with a smile that was anything but settling...

"Well hello there... You must be my new sister. Wow, Mom said you'd be cute, but I think I'm falling for you honey." She winked... And licked her lips in a very sexual way.

"Now, now dear... Be nice to our new family member. Sorry about that." Said a women looking not much older than the girl who opened the door as she moved in. "I am Ms. Trisha... You're sister here is Lora." She smiled.

"Nice to meet you Lora, Ms. Trisha." Bowed Sarah, looking nervous.

"I'm making dinner soon. Lora, why don't you take Sarah here to your room." Said the mom, as the girl named Lora grabbed Sarah hand and began to bring her upstairs to her room in a very big hurry.

She took Sarah up to a large room in no time. It was bigger than the room most of the orphans lived it! Sarah was shocked that this space belonged to one rich girl... A massive water bed, a huge book shelf... A Closet with a lock on it too. But above all else Sarah was shocked to find a 4 foot long snake sitting in a large tank.

"That's Wiggles... He loves to meet new people." She winked at Sarah.

"D-Does he now? S-sorry. I'm sure he's a great pet but... I-I've never been one for snakes. I think they are slimy." Sarah blushed and looked at Wiggles with a forced smile.

"Awe, Don't worry. You'll get to know him soon enough... Hey? Want a drink there sis?" Offered Lora, holding up a strange looking cup of green something? Looked like Koolaid or something like that. Smelled sweet too. Not wanting to be rude, Sarah took the drink and drank it. It actually was really good. But soon she felt dizzy. The room began to spin, and she blacked out... The last thing she heard was her new sisters laughter... And when she awoke she found herself now 6 inches tall and...

123.content:
When Sarah awake she found herself on something soft, with something bright beating down on her. Opening her eyes and found that she was no longer in the bedroom of her new sister, but on the ground in the dirt with the sun over head... At least, she thought that as she got up, and realized she was not outside, but inside some kind of glass tank? The dirt below was just some fake pet store crap... But, Bigger?

"Hehe... Awe, you look so much cuter at that size." Said Lora, her voice booming and all around. Making Sarah look around to try to find her, only to look up and find her standing over her, looking down and smiling.

"W-What is going on!? W-What is this? W-Where am I? W-why are you so big?!" Shouted the tiny girl.

"Oh, Well, let me see... I gave you a drink I made in my lab in my closet... You passed out and shrunk, then I dropped you in Wiggles tank to play." Lora said, smiling at Sarah more and more.

"Wiggles?... U-uh-oh..." She said, and heard something behind her... Turning slowly, she saw the 4 foot long snake, well, 4 feet to Lora, but Now giant to Sarah.

The giant girl happily sat down, and watched as her pet looked and Loomed over her adopted sister. The snake moving around as Sarah began to try to think of a way out. She remained calm and cool headed, for the moment anyway, and it seemed to make Wiggles leave her be. Lora however seemed to be getting bored, and then tapped the tank. The snake got annoyed, and grabbed Sarah, crushing her some in it's powerful coils.

"A-AHH!" Shouted the girl, as the snake moved over her, hissing and sticking it's tongue out.

Lora watched and waited, smiling the whole time, eager to watch her sister get swallowed up. "Oh! This is going to be fun. Don't worry about being digested by the way Sarah. That drink I made will keep you safe from most damage. Even being in a pool of acid and smothered by my snakes stomach..." She said, and waited as Wiggles began to open it's mouth to enjoy it's next snack...

14.content:
You had just been dropped off down the street by the taxi you had taken from the orphanage, ready for your new life with the women who had promised to take you in. An older orphan, at 14, you hadn't expected to be adopted but here you were. You were nervous to leave the place you had lived for the past ten years, practically your entire memory, but the family seemed to be good, and it wasn't like you were getting any younger, and a family might be nice for a while.

You saw the giant house, and made your way to the front door, anxious about meeting the people who were to be your new family. Taking a deep breath, you rung the doorbell and waited for someone to answer. You were soon met by the woman you recognized as Ms Trisha.

"You must be Sarah!" She exclaimed, with a smile that more resembled a grin, before continuing. "Come on in and give me a hug." You followed her instructions, hauling the bag to the interior of the lovely home, before wrapping your arms around her, getting a face full of her boobs while she puled you close. You smelt some perfume mixed with liquor, and she held on for a little longer than you were comfortable with, but other than that it was a fine hug.

She finally let go of you, before starting up again. "I think you'll love it here sweety! Come on in a little, we'll get you settled." You followed her inside, making your way to the kitchen, observing her ass jiggle in the yoga pants she had wrapped around the monster of a tush. Inside there were two girls, both grinning the same unsettling smile as their mother, obviously related to your new mother genetically.

"This is Lora," The MILF started up, pointing towards the older of the sisters, "And this is Tabby." she announced as she moved her finger towards the girl around age thirteen.

"Nice to meet you." Tabby said, before Lora spat out a similar "How do you do?"

"I'm good, I'm excited to live with you guys." You say nervously, as the women observe, giggling at your awkwardness.

"Now where are my manners?" Trisha questioned herself. "Let me go make you something to drink. Girls, behave while I'm gone." She then proceeded to walk into the next room, which you were confused out due to the presence of a sink in the kitchen. Before you could raise the question however, Lora started up.

"Do you remember anything other than the orphanage?" She asked.

"Not really, I've lived there since I can remember." You replied.

"Well trust me, the living arrangements here will be much different." She giggled, before her younger sister did the same. You also found this quite curious, however your new mother soon walked back in with a glass of water for you.

"Drink up honey, I know it's been some time since you were able to get a drink at the orphanage." She politely said, handing you the drink. You thanked her, before taking a sip of the water, noticing a orange aftertaste. They watched eagerly as you drank the entire glass, enthralled by the strange taste of it.

"Nighty night Sarah." Trisha whispered, making you raise an eyebrow in confusion, before your vision blacked out entirely. You didn't remember what you dreamed, or even if you had a dream, but when you awoke you were shocked to find yourself naked, and at three inches tall. What was even more scary was that you were with

“Okay, some ground rules,” she made sure her voice was audible. And then winked at the tiny girl. “If you wanna live here you have to do everything I say, alright?”

“So trust me when I say I’m gonna be having a lot of fun with you.” Tabby smirked, and squashed her lips against most of Sarah’s body.

1432112.content:
“So uhh... your girlfriend had a name?”

Sarah frowned up at the bigger teen. “...why?”

“Oh c’mon, humour me,” Tabby scooped her out from between her thighs. “You had a life before... this. Tell me about it.”

“This is all part of your torture thing, is it?” Sarah groaned.

“You wanna remind me of the life you guys took away?” She muttered.

Sarah balanced herself between Tabby’s boobs. “Well... if this is your idea of torture, I guess it could be worse. Her name was Liz. I couldn’t pronounce her weird Irish name so we kept it to Liz. She was a grade above me, and-“

“O-oh, sorry.”

“Anyway, we’d known each other for years. Turns out you can fall in love with someone you’ve known forever without even knowing it.” Sarah reminisced. “We had our first kiss... just over a year ago? Wait, what date is it?”

“Err... July 3rd.” Tabby informed.

“Ah. More like a year and a half then.” Sarah shrugged. “Fun birthday party that was.”

“Whose?”

“Hers. Started off as a dare, turned into a relationship. Joke’s on the dumb bitch that dared us.”

“Huh. Actually kinda romantic.” Tabby smiled. “Where... is she now?”

“Err, Tabs? I don’t even know where I am.” Sarah scoffed. “On account of the whole kidnapping thing?”

“Oh. Yeah.” Tabby mumbled. “Well... whaddya say we go find her?”

“Find her?” Sarah frowned. “And what, rub it in my face that I can’t be with her any more?”

“Well... who says you can’t?” Tabby said.

“The fact that I’m five inches tall.” Sarah deadpanned.

“Oh, get over yourself. You worked your magic on me.” Tabby dismissed.

“And what, you’re just gonna give me back to her?” Sarah was incredulous.

“Well...” Tabby bit her lip.

info.brief_description: Being adopted is hard. Being shrunk down and abused by your new family... Is even better.
info.description:
(( As of 3/12/17. For every good Chapter added, I will give 200 points to who ever makes it! :) Maybe even more if you do even better. Requirements for a good chapter are... At least 1500 Characters, Minimal spelling errors or typos, Neat and clean writing. and the better you do, the more points I give. ;) ))

Hello everyone! It's been a long time sense I've been back, and now that I am I'm ready to put my nose to the grind stone to make more stories for everyone! But it turns out doing this is not cheep, and being honest, I'm often broke. So if you find you enjoy this story, or just want to help out, Donations are welcome. :) And don't worry, if you're broke too or don't want to give, this story is still free to enjoy. So kick off your shoes, put your feet up, sit back, and enjoy. ;)

Guess I better put down the rules now. Please follow the rules as best you can. These are here to keep this friendly and fun for everyone. ;)

-----Rules-----

Rule 1 - There is a main story section, these are for me. Please do not add to these. Any additions not by me will be removed. No warning.

Rule 2 - Please keeps Typo's and errors to a minimum. I'm not going to complain about any you make. ;) All I'm saying is do your best to keep it neat and have fun.

Rule 3 - No bullying. Do not be mean to other players here. I don't want anyone to get in trouble with this one.

Rule 4 - No endings... Not for a long while anyway. Chapter 50 onward, I guess it's fine to end the story. But I'd rather it keep going as long as you guys can. ;)

Rule 5 - Speaking of no Endings. Let's avoid death as a ending. We can keep it rough, and tough. You'll be smooshed and smothered and swallowed and all kinds of stuff, but let's avoid something dark and scary as not everyone likes it.

Rule 6 - Of course... HAVE FUN! XD There really is no limits here to that one. Go out, and enjoy yourself so long as it follows the above rules.

-----Characters-----

Characters now! Here's the real fun. :3 Finding out who will abuse you. ;) Short description below of everyone you'll need to know.

Blake - The male of the story you can be. Blake is 16, tall, thin, rather plain, but very cute. He's shy around his new sisters, and his smocking hot new mom. They all seem to be all over him. He has short blond hair, and tan, toned skin. Speaking of toned, he's very fit. Having a thin runners body, and his blue eyes are to die for.

Sarah - Sarah is girl you can be if you don't like Blake. She's very cute, but is short at about 4 feet 2 inches tall. Making her a bit of a runt. She 14, and has a very fit runners body as well. A sweet little backside, and growing breast, B cup, but when she gets older they'll be twice that. Her hair is also long and black, white sexy blue eyes.

(NOTE! If you pick Blake, or Sarah, the other will not be in the story. Just remember that. ;) One or the other, not both.)

Lora - You're hot new older sister... 20 years old, a massive E cup breast, that can easily stand without even a bra. She always seems interested in you, and loves to tease you in naughty ways. Her hair is long and black, smooth as silk too... Her eyes a piercing dark color as well. With a smile that could kill, and often a deviant look on her face. She could get any one she wanted, but seems to enjoy being single. On top of that, she's very smart. Maybe she even knows why you're so small? Her room is large, with science stuff all in it, and a large tank she keeps her pet snake in... She loves to watch it eat her lab rats. Almost like she's aroused by it...

Tabby - the little sister of the family, she 13, but hardly looks it. She's very endowed for her age, with C cups, and still growing, and a ass that's so tight and round you wouldn't believe! She seems to love to play with dolls, and seems to love school too. She has many friends and is very bubbly. She Also loves to play outside, even once finding a frog out there so big she could barely hold it with 2 hands. She now keeps it as a pet in her room, and named it prince charming... Even though it's a girl frog. She's still sometimes wears diapers too... But just because she likes them. And who could say no to this blond, blue eyed cutie about how she dresses.

Ms. Trisha - Or Trisha for short. She's your new 42 year old mom... But she could pass for 25. Which she often lies to people about. She's a real go getter, and seems to love sex. She tries to keep it on the down low, but her room is full of sex toys. Her chest is a very perky C cup, almost Ds. And she loves to smother everyone with her chest. She's always dressing sexy, like a call girl or something, and best of all, she seems to have a thing for vore... She love dominating. Which is easy with her bondage gear as well... Black is her favorite color. Just like her hair, and her sexy dark brow eyes...

-----Non Family-----

The people you won't be seeing in the house a lot, but still.

Beth - Lora's friend. same age as her, and the neighbor girl. She's shy, with a perky, cute body. But not as over the top as your family is, sense most of them are like goddesses. Still, she's sweet, and seems to like you. Her hair is blond, her eyes brown, and she thinks small animals are cute. If she finds you, she'll be keeping you as a pet.

Terra - A friend of Tabby, with a very similar body type. She's amazingly cute, but not as busty as your little sister. She also seems to like to die her hair weird colors, like blue, pink, orange, red, so on... But her blue eyes always stay the same. She's very cute, and full of energy.

Megan and Jackie - Beth's two twin little sisters. They are twins, so it's easier to add them both at once here... Both have blond hair, and are 18. Blue eyes for Megan, and brown for Jackie. They are always together. And amazingly cute, With Massive breast, and legs for days! They love stealing things to tease Beth, and seem to be more than just close like sisters... More like close like lovers... They are in a secret relationship. Where they end up doing naughty things to one another every night... Should they get you... Things could get lewd fast...

Heather - You're moms... Lady friend... She seems to come over and spend only a few hours at your place with your mom... Or your mom goes out to meet her for a bit. It's clear she's selling sex to this girl. Who is a young 22 year old model. She's a little chubby, but not bad. She's got G cup breast, and loves to use them. She also seems to be rather wealthy, and because of this, pays her friend very well. She seems into bondage, and smothering. But above all is spoiled... If she gets you. you'll likely not be coming home anytime soon...

-----

I hope you all have fun. These are just the main characters. You can add your own, so on, and enjoy them as much as you want. ;) I hope you all have fun, and keep writing. And don't forget about the Donations. It will really help me make more stories, chapters, and keep around this site as long as I can. ;) OH! And don't forget to take a look at my other older works. ;)
